caption.p:
Three-dimensional morphology of the evolved nanostructure from compressible ABC copolymer melt ( a) in the simulation box of 12 × 12 × 12
R G 3
and ( b) in the unit cell of 6 × 6 × 6
R G 3
(1/8th of the simulation box). B and C domains are represented by green and blue color, respectively, and A domain as the matrix is erased intentionally.
